concept.title: Sampling Statistics
concept.shortdesc: When applications and cache servers join a distributed system, they indicate whether to enable statistics sampling and whether to archive the statistics that are gathered.

conbody.p: The following statistics are related to the statistic sampler.

row.entry: Total number of samples taken by this sampler.
Total amount of time spent taking samples.

conbody.p: For more information about configuring statistics, see .
